featured.text: After watching a TV program on natural history, Adam decided to go on a ______ for dinosaur fossils in South Dakota.
The project in Mexico City has brought new hope to reducing the use of fossil fuels.

definition.zh_def: 化石是指古代生物的遺骸或痕跡，通常被埋在岩石中並經過長時間的化學變化而保存下來。
definition.en_def: A fossil is the preserved remains or traces of a once-living organism, typically found in sedimentary rock and formed over a long period through chemical processes.
definition.example: The paleontologist discovered a dinosaur fossil in the excavation site.
